class HierarchicalEvaluation[source]

HierarchicalEvaluation(evaluators:List[typing.Callable])

Type Default Details
evaluators typing.List[typing.Callable] functions with arguments y, y_hat
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HierarchicalEvaluation.evaluate[source]

HierarchicalEvaluation.evaluate(Y_h:DataFrame, Y_test:DataFrame, tags:Dict[str, ndarray], benchmark:Optional[str]=None)

Type Default Details
Y_h DataFrame Forecasts with columns ['ds'] and models to evaluate.
Y_test DataFrame True values with columns ['ds', 'y']
tags typing.Dict[str, numpy.ndarray] Each key is a level and its value contains tags associated to that level.
benchmark typing.Optional[str] None If passed, evaluators are scaled by the error of this benchark.
{% endraw %}
